sentences.en: An angry mob gathered outside the municipal building.
sentences.cn: 一群愤怒的暴民聚集在市政大楼的外面.

sentences.en: Goebels rounded up a municipal councilor to perform the ceremony in the small conference room.
sentences.cn: 戈培尔找来一位市议员在一间小会议室里主持了这一仪式.

sentences.en: Half hidden even in winter by its embosoming trees, lay the municipal lunatic asylum.
sentences.cn: 即使在冬天也被环绕着的树林半遮半掩着的是一所市立精神病院.

sentences.en: He will be concerned also with the zoning and layouts of factories and municipal housing.
sentences.cn: 他将经营工厂和公用住宅群的分区规划和布局.

sentences.en: Islanders have campaigned for the abolition of one of the three tiers of municipal power on the island.
sentences.cn: 岛上居民发起一场运动，要求废除岛上三级市政管理层中的一级。

sentences.en: It has been traditional for them to dispose of their waste to municipal sewers.
sentences.cn: 一般毛纺废水直接排入城市下水道.

sentences.en: Municipal town and rural parish gradually made fresh threads of connection.
sentences.cn: 城市和乡村逐渐形成了千丝万缕的新关系.

sentences.en: The current yield on municipal bonds is 10 %.
sentences.cn: 当前市政债券的利润是百分之十.

sentences.en: The decor was reminiscent of a municipal arts-and-leisure centre.
sentences.cn: 这种布置让人想起都市里的艺术休闲中心。

sentences.en: The major sources of water pollution are industrial, municipal and agricultural.
sentences.cn: 水污染的主要来源是工业 、 都市和农业.

sentences.en: The municipal authorities gave the go-ahead for the march.
sentences.cn: 市政当局批准了此次游行。

sentences.en: The municipal authorities have kept the roads up well.
sentences.cn: 市政当局把道路保养得不错.

sentences.en: The municipal government will do something about the firetraps in the city.
sentences.cn: 市府将对城里容易失火的建筑物采取防患措施.

sentences.en: The one bright spot for municipal Wi - Fi is public safety.
sentences.cn: 城市Wi-Fi也 并非一无是处.

sentences.en: The opening of a market stall is governed by municipal fiat.
sentences.cn: 开设市场摊位受市政法令管制.

sentences.en: There was a basketball game at the Municipal Gymnasium yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天市体育馆有场篮球比赛.

words.tran_cn: 市制上；市政上；依市的规定
市民；市政当局；自治市或区

phrases.tran_cn: 城市垃圾；城市废物；城市废料

trans.tran_cn: 市的，市政的，地方自治的，都市的，市营的，市制的，内政的
trans.tran_en: relating to or belonging to the government of a town or city
